box.code:
# Create new MAUI project
dotnet new maui -n MyMauiApp

# Run on specific platform
dotnet build -t:Run -f net7.0-android
dotnet build -t:Run -f net7.0-ios
dotnet build -t:Run -f net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<ContentPage x:Class="MyMauiApp.MainPage"
             xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui"
             xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml">
    
    <ScrollView>
        <VerticalStackLayout Spacing="25" Padding="30,0" VerticalOptions="Center">
            
            <Label x:Name="CounterLabel"
                   Text="Welcome to .NET MAUI!"
                   SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel="Level1"
                   FontSize="32"
                   HorizontalOptions="Center" />
            
            <Button x:Name="CounterBtn"
                    Text="Click me"
                    SemanticProperties.Hint="Counts the number of times you click"
                    Clicked="OnCounterClicked"
                    HorizontalOptions="Center" />
                    
        </VerticalStackLayout>
    </ScrollView>
    
</ContentPage>

<!-- Basic Controls -->
<Label Text="Welcome to MAUI!" 
       HorizontalOptions="Center"
       FontSize="24"
       TextColor="Blue" />

<Entry Placeholder="Enter text here"
       Text="{Binding UserName}" />

<Button Text="Click Me" 
        Command="{Binding SubmitCommand}" />

<Image Source="dotnet_bot.png" 
       HeightRequest="200"
       HorizontalOptions="Center" />

<!-- Layout Containers -->
<StackLayout Orientation="Vertical" Spacing="10">
    <Label Text="Item 1" />
    <Label Text="Item 2" />
    <Label Text="Item 3" />
</StackLayout>

<Grid RowDefinitions="Auto, *" ColumnDefinitions="*, *">
    <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="Top Left" />
    <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Text="Top Right" />
    <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" Text="Bottom Full" />
</Grid>

<!-- Basic property binding -->
<Label Text="{Binding UserName}" />

<!-- Two-way binding for Entry -->
<Entry Text="{Binding Email, Mode=TwoWay}" />

<!-- Command binding -->
<Button Command="{Binding SaveCommand}" 
        Text="Save" />

<!-- Value conversion -->
<Label Text="{Binding BirthDate, 
                StringFormat='{0:MMM dd, yyyy}'}" />

<!-- Collection binding -->
<CollectionView ItemsSource="{Binding Users}">
    <CollectionView.ItemTemplate>
        <DataTemplate>
            <Label Text="{Binding Name}" />
        </DataTemplate>
    </CollectionView.ItemTemplate>
</CollectionView>

<!-- AppShell.xaml -->
<Shell xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui"
       xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml"
       xmlns:views="clr-namespace:MyMauiApp.Views"
       Title="MyMauiApp">
    
    <!-- Bottom Tabs -->
    <TabBar>
        <ShellContent Route="home" 
                      Title="Home" 
                      Icon="home.png"
                      ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate views:HomePage}" />
        
        <ShellContent Route="profile" 
                      Title="Profile" 
                      Icon="user.png"
                      ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate views:ProfilePage}" />
        
        <ShellContent Route="settings" 
                      Title="Settings" 
                      Icon="settings.png"
                      ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate views:SettingsPage}" />
    </TabBar>
    
    <!-- Flyout Menu Items -->
    <FlyoutItem Title="About">
        <ShellContent Route="about" 
                      ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate views:AboutPage}" />
    </FlyoutItem>
    
</Shell>

list.text: Shared Logic - Same code for web and mobile

box.code:
# Build for Android
dotnet build -c Release -f net7.0-android -p:AndroidPackageFormat=apk

# Build for iOS (requires Mac)
dotnet build -c Release -f net7.0-ios -p:BuildIpa=true

# Build for Windows
dotnet build -c Release -f net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0

# Publish single file (Windows)
dotnet publish -c Release -f net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 \
  -p:PublishSingleFile=true \
  -p:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true

# Create Android APK
dotnet publish -c Release -f net7.0-android -p:AndroidPackageFormat=apk
